book.synopsis: While trying to sort out the problems within their dysfunctional family, the Raglan siblings must now face the brutal murder of their father, Gordie, and return to the childhood home that they desperately wish to forget, where an unimaginable evil waits in the shadows to destoy them. Reprint.
book.dimensions: Height: 6.75 Inches, Length: 3.5 Inches, Weight: 0.4 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
